violations.title: Proper hot holding
violations.narrative: Potentially hazardous foods not being held at 135F(57C) or above for hot hold. (3-501.16) ... Hamburger patty 124F wrapped on counter; Chicken n rice 127F warmer. Corrected by using 4 hr time as control; cooked to 151F–160F; discarded before 2 pm.

violations.title: Proper cold holding
violations.narrative: Potentially hazardous foods not being held at 41F (5C) or below for cold hold. (3-501.16). Milk 46F in milk cooler 1. Corrected by manager discarding milk.
